inbound.title: Inbound Process
inbound.description: The entire process where shippers register inbound plans to FULGO WMS, logistics companies approve and receive actual products, and store them in the warehouse. The FULGO platform tracks and manages all progress in real-time.

outbound.title: Outbound Process
outbound.description: The entire process where when orders come from external sales channels (Coupang, Naver Shopping, etc.), FULGO collects them and delivers them to logistics companies to pack and ship to customers.

return.title: Return Process
return.description: The entire process where if a customer requests a return due to product issues, the logistics company receives the product again, inspects it, and either restocks or discards it.

storage.title: Storage & Inventory Management
storage.description: The daily operational process where logistics companies efficiently manage warehouse space, and FULGO accurately tracks inventory status by shipper.

hierarchyInfo.title: Hierarchy Structure
hierarchyInfo.description: This process consists of 3 main layers:
